text: Beware this is only for 1 toothbrush - not 3 as shown in the picture.My experience:I wanted 2 toothbrushes. I was contemplating whether to take this and pay extra shipping or whether to take a pack of 6 for no shipping from another seller. I decided to buy this and pay for extra shipping because i thought its worth the money as i was getting 3 for the extra shipping cost.Turns out, there is only 1 toothbrush in the order. Seller did not accept the mistake - though the picture clearly shows 3 toothbrushes. As a result, i had to order another toothbrush and pay the shipping again.
title: Just one toothbrush

text: I bought this product because I thought it was a 3 pack and was really disappointed when there was only one toothbrush when the package was delivered. I needed more than one because two of my kids are travelling.  I wish I had read the reviews before I purchased. The picture really needs to be changed, very misleading!
title: ONLY ONE TOOTHBRUSH, NOT THREE

text: As others have said, be aware that this is only one toothbrush and not three. That being said, the brush is compact and fits well in most dopp kits, and the integrated folding keeps the brush head clean.
title: Compact travel toothbrush

text: this is a very compact self-storing toothbrush, but it is flimsy  as can be. And also it's too short to reach the back teeth. I bought, I tried it, I learned.........Get a real toothbrush and a travel holder and your doing yourself better.
title: look for something better

text: Misleading ad shows Thtee brushes. .thete is only One ..Quality marginal
title: Three Stars

text: There was supposed to be two toothbrushes in the package. I only received one.
title: Two Stars

text: Super great travel brush.  No complaints but pick this up at the store for a buck.  Boy did I feel stupid for paying such a premium for  dollar store item.
title: OVER PRICED

text: It's not 3, as shown in the picture. Plus, it arrived as a separate package, which's a trouble if you are living in an apartment.
title: only 1 toothbrush
